doc:
Olinka Hardiman https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Olinka_Hardiman 0 Olinka Hardiman (born 16 January 1960) is a French model and actress. She is best known for looking like actress Marilyn Monroe and often portrayed her idol as a lookalike in the movies she appeared in, many of which were very adult in nature. She also did several adult magazine layouts. She was extremely supple and could perform contortions such as in Inside Marilyn (1985) where she performs the splits whilst standing on one leg, lifting the other leg up and pointing it at the ceiling. Olinka_Hardiman ( born_16_January_1960 ) is a_French_model_and_actress . She is_best_known for looking like actress_Marilyn_Monroe and often portrayed her_idol as a_lookalike in the_movies she appeared in , many of which were very_adult in nature . She also did several_adult_magazine_layouts . She was extremely_supple and could_perform contortions such_as in Inside_Marilyn_(_1985 ) where she performs the splits whilst standing on one_leg , lifting the_other_leg up and pointing it at the_ceiling .
